name: Fatal Attraction (ow1byte)
description:
in this noir-inspired mystery game, you've come to this hotel looking for love, but what you find instead is the scene of a murder! there aren't any other hotels in the area, so you're stuck staying a floor above a crime scene. the hotel is locked down, and the killer has yet to be found. who will you trust? is it safe to spend the night with anyone at all? steel your heart and find out! is your attraction truly fatal?

--------------------- CREDITS

character designs + portraits by ensen cai

ground tilesets + game development by lu mulholland

mary + detective + background NPC sprites by victoria troendle

research + organization + early visual development by nancy bryant

candy sprite + idle + anton sprite by ra lahoda

we used interior prop asset packs by:

death's darling

sharm

limezu

dreamypixelart

shubibubi

silveira neto
